title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker seeks help after his identity is revealed, leading to multiverse chaos.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home after the loss of their king.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange battles threats across the multiverse with help from new and old friends.

title: Jurassic World: Dominion
description: Humans and dinosaurs try to coexist after the fallout of a global dinosaur escape.

title: The Batman
description: Batman fights crime and uncovers corruption in Gotham City.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor embarks on a new adventure accompanied by new and old allies to combat a powerful threat.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: Captain Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell teaches a new generation of pilots at the Top Gun school.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides leads his family and people in a fight over a desert planetâ€™s precious resource.

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond comes out of retirement to face a new threat.

title: The Matrix Resurrections
description: Neo returns to the Matrix to uncover new truths and fight against the system.
